entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:49 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 7:49 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:49 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
